title:
Where may I find a list of all officals running for election as well as information about them



thank you

evelina
text:
Right now the StarNews is in the process of compiling a list and
information about the upcoming elections. Here's our web page, which
is being updated: http://www.starnewsonline.com/section/news102



Inn the coming weeks, that site will contain bios and stances of
those running in the upcoming races. The StarNews will also be
printing bios and stories on the candidates.
